title: Summoner Spells Glitch
body: I have this glitch where if i open where you change summoner spells i pick a summoner spell e.g ignite and when it takes me out it gives me a shaded screen and I'm not able to type in a champion to pick,type in the chat,trade champions or even pick a champion  there is nothing else to do so i had to dodge which cost me one of my promo games

replies.body:
Hello! This might not be any help what so ever buuut, there's already a thread about this "[Here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells)" from 'Riot Gehirn' about this and you should check it out. There's also a lot of other threads posted by other people so you are not alone! 

tl:dr They're fixing it, just have to wait.
